JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Truckdriver needed for outdoor sorting in Nyborg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Description

Your primary job is to sort garbage. This job will be a combination of forklift driving and physical work.

The main part of the job is going to be done outside, so are you looking for a job with fresh air, this is the perfect for you.

You tasks will mostly consist of:

  • Sorting garbage for incinerator.
  • Scan goods and placing on pallets.
  • Sorting different kind og substances and materials.
  • Truck driving and transport.

Professional skills:

Truck ceritificat and experience

Experience with fragile elements is a benefit

Personal qualifications:

Careful and structured

Both danish and english speakers are accepted

 

Further details:

Start pay: 150 kr. - Wage can increase to 180 kr., after a couple of months.

 

Wanna be a part of the team?

Send your CV and application to dfi@jobteam.dk to apply for the job. You can also call 93639344 if you have further questions!
